name: Bonding Bad
description:
Bonding Bad is a Spacechem-inspired puzzle game about binding atoms into molecules to form specified structures!

Basic controls:
Left click to place things.
Right click to remove things.

Further controls/instructions in-game.

Made for #ld40 #ldjam by Diptoman Mukherjee (Programming/design), Pranjal Bisht (art) and Joel Montpetit (audio).

LD Link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/bonding-bad
